attributes.action: Ban Garfield and related characters from all internet message boards (such as B3TA)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There have been an alarming rise in mental health issues since the explosion of poor cartoon based internet posts using the character Garfield and associated characters within the said comic strip.
THIS MUST STOP> SAVE OUR CHILDRENS SANITY.
THEY ARE THE FUTURE!!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
